content: Fixes some issues with assigning tables in Luauâ€™s New Type Solver where optional fields were mistakenly required.
Adds a field to Class.DataModel called MatchmakingType and a corresponding enum with the following values: Default, XboxOnly, and PlayStationOnly.
When you set a custom icon theme, StudioService:GetClassIcon() now returns your custom icons within the New Explorer Beta.
Overhauls the handling of scrolling in the Roblox engine so that scroll deltas are no longer always integers.
Adds the Lock button and Anchor tool button to the new Ribbon in Next Gen Studio Preview.
Fixes a bug where an animation assetID would sometimes overlap the copy button in the post-publish pop-up window.
Luau require expressions now support arguments containing () or typeof type annotations containing a resolvable instance path.
Fixes a Next Gen Studio Preview bug where the command bar would hide when opening a script.
Class.WrapDeformer now respects its Class.WrapDeformer.CageOrigin|CageOrigin property rather than using the position of its sibling Class.WrapTarget.
Fixes a crash that would occur when an avatar rig contained legacy clothing alongside layered clothing without a Class.SurfaceAppearance object.
Fixes bug where parts of the rig in the IK chain of Class.IKControl have incorrect scale and offset when ScaleTo is called on the model.
Fixes a New Explorer Beta bug where inserted services didn't become visible in the Explorer window.
